title: Casual Club Looking For Some Members
body:
Club Name: Keen As Beans 

Just a casual club that's looking for members, It'll be cool to set up some theme teams or custom games in the future. We have a discord channel set up already, just comment below if you're keen to join and I'll send an invite, Thanks.

Club hopes to encourage
-Custom Games
-Ranked Partying
-Themed Games
-Fun!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: I'd love to join

I'd be keen if you're still interested!

Stormfire777

Id join add me in 
Symeze
I would love to join your club
invite would be awesome (:

invite plz~~~~ 
im sup main btw
Invite please :)

> [{quoted}](name=Hot BBQ Grill,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=Zex3Ap5G,comment-id=0024,timestamp=2016-03-17T02:15:49.835+0000)
>
> Invite please :)

Unfortunately our club is already capped out. >_< We'll invite you in the future once the cap increases.
Id love to join something like this, that isn't super hardcore XD
This club looks fun, i would like to join
Sure I'd like to join if you have room. It sounds like fun.
im keen as beans for an invite
Hi there, me and my friend Bot Games do not mind joining your club, thanks!

All of you are invited :)

Welcome!
I'd like to join as well if possible :) CosmicKramer
im keen

Love your idea! please invite if you see me online.
Add me, i'm slowdownn

Thanks
I also want to join, hit me up whenever you can.
dont forget to invite BlackBear
Couldn't find anyone named BlackBear, I invited Talon12 tho :)
:) never gonna happen
Hey Guys! Feel free to add me too since I'm also managing the Club. :D

Added, btw if you guys could rate up this post, it'll really help out the club

Thanks! :D
Sounds fun, but I'm not the best, add me

Again, this isn't necessarily a ranked team. Sure enough if members choose to rank together that'd be amazing, but all ranks/levels are welcome whether you're good or bad, we're just looking to have fun :)
Added as friend
I'm not very good, just new to 30 but I main {{champion:267}}  and {{champion:25}}  support, just about to learn {{champion:12}} .. if you need a rookie support let me know
im keen
Rank and lev don't matter, I've added you all as friends and I'll be inviting to the club tonight
Aphlex , Im up
Ill join the Club :)
I'm out atm and can't add people to the club from my phone, for now I'll add anyone that wants to join as friends. That way when I'm on tonight I'll be able to send you all a club invite

Not really a single team but more of a community, this club would be a place to meet and play with more people, soon we'll be organizing custom games, themed games and plan to have some fun with 5 man trolling in norms. Eg 5 mid, 5 smite, all mid, and anything else we can come up with!
Where is the option to join the club ? I cannot find :/

Hi! :D

To join the club, all I need to do us add you. Atm there isn't another way apart from personally inviting
ooh so is it like just making a regular team? I thought they build a club option where we all can see us, I added you but u already off lol
Still looking for some club officers to help me add people, lemme know if interested. I'll be adding more people tmro
No mics aren't needed, Invited! :D
I'd love to join, but I don't have a microphone. Is that OK?
im keen to join - BlueyOFWGKTA
Both invited, Welcome! :D
Sign me up please!
I'm interested in the custom games :) maybe some others too but I love fun casual scrims!
Actually looking for a couple club officers to help me establish, let me know if you're a Keen lil Bean
I'm keen to join - Squidy69er
Invite Sent! :D

would like to join ign Barry Lyon

I'd like to join! :) Does it matter if we're not ranked or not level 30?
